title: Comparing Pfizer's (NYSE: PFE) FY 2024 Q1, Q2, and Q3 global biopharma revenues against FY 2023 Q1, Q2, and Q3 global biopharma revenues, in which of these 2024 quarters did Pfizer perform the best against its corresponding 2023 quarter? Express the answer by stating the 2024 quarter and its percent change, rounded to two decimal points of precision: "Q[X] 2024: ±XX.XX%".
description:
1) Find the percent change between Q1 2024 and Q1 2023 global biopharma revenues. Using the Q1 2024 press release, find: 
 Q1 2024 biopharma revenues: $14,604M 
 Q1 2023 biopharma revenues: $18,173M
 Calculate the percent change between the figures: [($14,604M - $18,173M)/$18,173M] x 100 = -19.64% (rounded to two decimal points of precision).
 
 2) Find the percent change between Q2 2024 and Q2 2023 global biopharma revenues. Using the Q2 2024 press release, find: 
 Q2 2024 biopharma revenues: $12,991M
 Q2 2023 biopharma revenues: $12,690M
 Calculate the percent change between the figures: [($12,991M - $12,690M)/$12,690M] x 100 = +2.37% (rounded to two decimal points of precision).
 
 3) Find the percent change between Q3 2024 and Q3 2023 global biopharma revenues. Using the Q3 2024 press release, find: 
 Q3 2024 biopharma revenues: $17,392M
 Q3 2023 biopharma revenues: $13,188M
 Calculate the percent change between the figures: [($17,392M - $13,188M)/$13,188M] x 100 = +31.88% (rounded to two decimal points of precision).
 
 4) Identify the 2024 quarter that experienced the greatest percent growth compared to its corresponding 2023 quarter. This is Q3 because its percent change has the greatest positive magnitude of +31.88%.

rubric.criteria: Calculate the percent change between Q1 2024 and Q1 2023 biopharma revenues: ($14,604M - $18,173M)/$18,173M] x 100 = -19.64%
Calculate the percent change between Q2 2024 and Q2 2023 biopharma revenues: [($12,991M - $12,690M)/$12,690M] x 100 = +2.37%
Calculate the percent change between Q3 2024 and Q3 2023 biopharma revenues: [($17,392M - $13,188M)/$13,188M] x 100 = +31.88%
Identify the 2024 quarter that experienced the greatest percent growth compared to its corresponding 2023 quarter: Q3
Final answer includes the value "+31.88%", as this corresponds to the percent growth of biopharma revenues from Q3 2023 and Q3 2024
Final answer is rounded to two decimal points of precision
Final answer is in the prompt-given format: Q[X] 2024: ±XX.XX%
